title: Are you planning on reverting The assassin rework? Bcs you know i miss my old buddy rengar

replies.body:
Yea i don't miss any form of rengar.{{champion:32}} 


Totally not just saying that cause i'm an adc main{{item:3070}}
Rengar 1 shots harder than he did before. he just takes actual forethought before doing so now.
Press R and then proceed to run at them and hit all the buttons!
Cried for a month to revert Kata. Still nothing... I don't have much hope in the dev team.
